meanings.sent1: The table was leveled so that the cups wouldn't tip over.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter leveled the surface before placing the tiles.
meanings.sent3: The leveled ground made it easy to set up the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as leveled as a calm lake on a windless day.
meanings.sent5: The leveled road stretched out like a smooth ribbon through the countryside.

meanings.definition: Adjusted to a particular standard or value
meanings.sent1: The leveled scores showed everyone had done equally well.
meanings.sent2: She leveled her expectations to avoid disappointment.
meanings.sent3: The leveled prices made shopping a breeze.
meanings.sent4: His mood was as leveled as the thermostat set at a comfortable temperature.
meanings.sent5: The leveled playing field ensured fair competition for all.

meanings.sent1: The leveled building left only rubble behind.
meanings.sent2: The tornado leveled the entire neighborhood in minutes.
meanings.sent3: The leveled tree made way for a new playground.
meanings.sent4: His hopes were leveled like a house in the path of a bulldozer.
meanings.sent5: The leveled cityscape resembled a scene from a post-apocalyptic movie.
